author: Alejandro1400
body:
#### PR description:

This PR has tests for lhcinfo_analyzer for both PerFill and PerLS. This have been created after in pull request #48678 the tests that were manually analyzing that the values introduced by the writer are the same ones as returned to tester. The tests defined for this one are instead more generalized, where we want to print the result and check that the number of fields for CondFormats/RunInfo/interface/LHCInfoPerFill.h "which is 29" is correspondent to the number of lines from the print. The number for assertion is 31, due to the print of both the IOV and the line *LHCInfoPerFill retrieved:\n* "

The PR is also related to issue [ts-coordination#26](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cms-ppd/technical-support/ts-coordination/-/issues/56)

Also the test is named in BuildFile.xml

#### PR validation:

For validation, the tests were run, were the values that are inserted are through writer and we analize the SQLite file that is created. The results are working and the number of lines was modified to confirm that the exceptions were handled correctly for both files, which produces an output like this (the code just prints last 5 lines if failed but for testing purposes I printed the entire file):

```
[asalgado@lxplus965 test]$ bash ./test_lhcinfo_analyzer.sh
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:37:54.186 CEST
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:37:59.530 CEST
Log output (last 31 lines):
LHC fill: 7066
Lumi section: 1
Run number: 301765
Crossing angle x (urad): 170
Crossing angle y (urad): 170
Beta star x (m): 11
Beta star y (m): 11

Failure: LHCInfoPerLSAnalyzer_cfg.py log has wrong number of lines (expected 87, got 31)
[asalgado@lxplus965 test]$ bash ./test_lhcinfo_analyzer.sh
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:38:55.923 CEST
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:39:01.675 CEST
[asalgado@lxplus965 test]$ bash ./test_lhcinfo_analyzer.sh
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:45:36.403 CEST
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:45:41.026 CEST
[asalgado@lxplus965 test]$ bash ./test_lhcinfo_analyzer.sh
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:45:53.412 CEST
Begin processing the 1st record. Run 1, Event 1, LumiSection 1 on stream 0 at 26-Aug-2025 15:45:57.408 CEST
Log output (last 5 lines):
Crossing angle x (urad): 170
Crossing angle y (urad): 170
Beta star x (m): 11
Beta star y (m): 11

Failure Failure: LHCInfoPerLSAnalyzer_cfg.py log has wrong number of lines (expected 32, got 31): status
```
title: LHCInfoAnalyzer Tests
